stories.title: Show HN: Distributed – How remote teams stay in sync
Ameerpet, India’s unofficial IT training hub (2017)

stories.text:
During the last year, I have intensively researched the topic of greenwashing and the possibilities of making ecological sustainability verifiable with the help of Open Science. My goal is to start a company in this field.

Unfortunately, during my research I did not find a single company that publishes its ESG / sustainability reports on the basis of Open Science, so that the data, models and software used can be reproduced transparently.

Why do companies not dare to be transparent with their calculations in this area? Why has not a single company gone this way, although Open Science is very widespread in areas such as Climate Science today?

I see massive potential for sustainable companies to differentiate themselves from greenwashing competitors.
stories.title: Ask HN: Is there any Open Science in corporate sustainability reports?
Which AWS API Endpoints Support IPv6?

stories.text:
Recently i moved back to home town because of WFH after working as a SDE for 3 years in a Tier-1 city.

Now, i have few ideas which can solve various problem around a small village/city. I'm trying to take tech first approach because most of the people here use mobile/internet already.

What do you suggest i should do to create a small community online ? I mean i can develop an app/webiste but how do i approach people to tell them about my ideas ?
stories.title: Ask HN: Start online community in a village/small city
Why Does the Myth of the Confederate Lost Cause Persist?
